about.me: We believe in a better world through decentralized finance. We aspire to be a fundamental contributor to the mission of the community to deliver better independence, transparency, flexibility, privacy and freedom through blockchain technology. We will focus on efficiency, redundancy, security and user-centricity in all our services.
about.server: Hosted in the cloud and located in Neurenberg(DE), Missouri(US) and Singapore(SG) | Servers configuration: 6core CPU|16GB RAM|400GB SSD|400Mbit/s NET
about.company: DBITS BVBA, also known under its trading name Azullian, is a software development company founded in 2009.
